name: test_e2e_with_logs[PATH_DOT_001]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `PATH_DOT_001` |
| **Name** | Password file access via dot-dot-slash |
| **Category** | PATH |
| **Subcategory** | dot_dot_slash |
| **Severity** | `CRITICAL` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `../etc/passwd`

## Test Execution Results
